say_launch: You can say things like Alexa, tell Kodi to pause, or Alexa, tell Kodi to launch Exodus.
say_card: I've added a card to your Alexa app with more help and detailed examples.

card_help:
Welcome to Kodi Alexa! You can use this skill to voice control your Kodi Instances through Alexa-enabled devices like the Amazon Echo or Dot.
⋅
All of the voice commands start with 'Alexa, tell/ask Kodi to ...'
